Description: An example resource schema demonstrating some basic constructs and validation rules.
Schema: {"typeName":"Gremlin::Agent::Helm","description":"An example resource schema demonstrating some basic constructs and validation rules.","sourceUrl":"https://github.com/arunbhagyanath/qs-sysdig.git","definitions":{"Arn":{"type":"string","pattern":"^arn:aws(-(cn|us-gov))?:[a-z-]+:(([a-z]+-)+[0-9])?:([0-9]{12})?:[^.]+$"}},"properties":{"ClusterID":{"description":"EKS cluster name","type":"string"},"KubeConfig":{"description":"Secrets Manager ARN for kubeconfig file","$ref":"#/definitions/Arn"},"RoleArn":{"description":"IAM to use with EKS cluster authentication, if not resource execution role will be used","$ref":"#/definitions/Arn"},"Namespace":{"description":"Namespace to use with helm. Created if doesn't exist and default will be used if not provided","type":"string"},"Name":{"description":"Name for the helm release","type":"string"},"Values":{"description":"Custom Values can optionally be specified","type":"object","additionalProperties":false,"patternProperties":{"^.+$":{"type":"string"}}},"ValueYaml":{"description":"String representation of a values.yaml file","type":"string"},"Version":{"description":"Version can be specified, if not latest will be used","type":"string"},"ValueOverrideURL":{"description":"Custom Value Yaml file can optionally be specified","type":"string","pattern":"^[sS]3://[0-9a-zA-Z]([-.\\w]*[0-9a-zA-Z])(:[0-9]*)*([?/#].*)?$"},"ID":{"description":"Primary identifier for Cloudformation","type":"string"},"TimeOut":{"description":"Timeout for resource provider. Default 60 mins","type":"integer"},"VPCConfiguration":{"type":"object","description":"For network connectivity to Cluster inside VPC","additionalProperties":false,"properties":{"SecurityGroupIds":{"description":"Specify one or more security groups","type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}},"SubnetIds":{"description":"Specify one or more
